revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=GooBang Doo |model=ABOX |revision=A4 |asin=B07NF2HMY1;AE;, B01JZ3CTDS;DE;, |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=06/25/2018 |fcc_id=2AP8X-ABOX, 2AMYS-ABOX |type=media streamer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905W |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H26M52208FPR |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G0446Q-HYK0 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_module_if=SD (solder down) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43435;BROADCOM, BCM43435KUBG, HE1707 P10, 794-0T 3E, 39-15; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=Bluetooth 4.1, H.265 |stock_os=Android TV;7.1.2;Nougat; |802dot11_protocols=bgn }}
"A95XA1_V2_0" and "20170905" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
FCC entry also covers models: :• ABOX A4, ABOX A6, ABOX A8, ABOX A10, ABOX M1, ABOX M2, :• ABOX M5, ABOX M8, ABOX M10, MXQ MAX, MOYIMO
FCC documents only mention Bluetooth 3.0 support but the Amazon page claims BT 4.0 support :and Wi-Fi/BT module appears to have a Broadcom BCM43435 but this is not a well-known part.
"The BCM43435 is not intended for the broad market" - [https://community.cypress.com/thread/7711?start=0&tstart=0 ''BCM43435 linux driver for 4.1 kernel'']
===Links=== * [https://forum.xda-developers.com/general/device-reviews-and-information/depth-review-abox-a4-fine-tv-box-t3793390 ''In-depth review of the ABOX A4: a fine TV box, but nothing more'' on '''xda-developers''']
===See also=== *[[NEXBOX ABOX A1]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AMYS-ABOX/Attestation-Statements/Letter-of-declaration-model-difference-3531919 2AMYS-ABOX] (2017-08-28) :EUT (OTT TV BOX) Model Number: :• ABOX A1, ABOX Pro, ABOX A1 mini, ABOX A1 plus, ABOX A2, ABOX A3, :• ABOX A3 plus, ABOX A4, ABOX A4 plus, ABOX A5, ABOX A5 plus, :• GooBang Doo XB-II, GooBang Doo XB-III, GooBang Doo XB-IV, Doo XB-V, :• GooBang Doo M8S-II, GooBang Doo M8S-III, GooBang Doo Master, :• Globmall X1, Globmall X2, Globmall X3, Globmall X4, MXQ, 9MXQ Pro, T95X
